text: HI All, can somebody explain to me why i cant create system pages? I was told that there is appropriate subscription to it, but whenever i try to create anything they never show up.

I am having trouble with the HubSpot cache again. Pages that are saved does not change. Its present in the "Edit Page" part of the admin. But when opening the page, it does not update. It can sometimes take hours. Are there any tricks for this to go faster?
We can not suggest a solution like this to our customers. They have to pay for the time waiting for pages to update.

Even tried to update templates and layouts to make it go faster. But they don't work either ..
And, after an hour or two .. the changes are there.

Edit: In the morning, its at a normal speed ( like 5 seconds ) But now ..
?hsCacheBuster=  from the plugin did the trick :heart:

Hello - new here - looking to understand/learn what capabilities HubSpot CMS has to support not only our marketing team but also our online customer who purchase items from us.

Will spend some time reviewing some of the channels here but feel free to point me in the right direction.

Things I am looking for:

1. Can HS CMS implementation have the ability to call out and fetch products from an external commerce solution?  For example ability to dynamically create a product detail page
2. Can HS CMS be used by our customers to place items in a cart and place orders - all things transactional - with external commerce solution
Looking at the ideal of moving towards a composable commerce architecture and want to see how HS CMS can play a role if any.

Thanks

Hi All, im new and have a quick question:   what happens to my custom code of my pages, when HubSpot makes a platform upgrade?

I didnt use templates
will my site break and go down?

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
Simon hello! I just saw your message, thank you very much!
Anyone know of a good guide for managing HubSpot cookies through GTM's consent management? Looking for something beyond the API documentation ideally.

Does anyone know how to have separate headers for separate pages. I am using the interactive theme , and I want to have a CTA button that says sign out on one of private content pages. I am not sure how to do that.
Can anyone tell me why these are all different colors?
Also the Feedback Submissions api is still in beta but it doesn't get a cool badge: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/feedback-submissions>
